pages.text: A common sight in most factories, a Belt can carry items and entities in a straight line.

$(l)Belt Building$()$(br2)Right-click on a $(l:rotation/age1_andesite/shaft)Shaft$() to set an initial position, and again on another Shaft in a straight line (or a vertical diagonal at 45 degrees) to complete the Belt. You'll know a second Shaft is a valid target if the first Shaft emits green particles at it. The particles will be purple if it's invalid.
